title: Inside monthly sex mansion parties - with 'playrooms' and a no single men policy
text:

Hundreds of horny revellers are flocking to wild sex parties with "playrooms" to live out their wildest fantasies.

Killing Kittens, or KK Club, hosts the soirées so men and women can "change the way people think about sex and dating".

But no single men are allowed and, unlike swingers' clubs, people at KK meetings don't have to actively get involved in the action.

"With us sex is the by product, if you want to do it, you can but there is more to the party. Some people come just for the vibe," KK owner Emma Sayle said.

Emma, who is an old school pal of The Duchess of Cambridge, Kate Middleton , says the name comes from the popular meme "every time you masturbate god kills a kitten".

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: S Meddle/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

The company holds parties every month across the country and in Ireland.

It's website reads: "You’ll arrive masked at a beautiful London mansion to be met by KK Kittens who will guide you through to the bar area. Sip on bubbles and mingle with fellow members in the separate bar area with some tunes in the background.

"Wonder off to the separate playrooms at your discretion, play in your own world of fantasy or join your fantasies together with other members for an explosive evening… There is no set agenda to these parties…you set the rhythm and pace.

(Image: Manchester Evening News)

(Image: Stephen Butler/REX/Shutterstock)

"Our parties carry absolutely no obligation to ‘take part’, if you’d rather have a few drinks and a sexy boogie then go for it! All you need to do now is take the plunge and book your tickets.

"We’ll email out rules, regulations and the address 24 hours before the party. In the meantime once you’re booked and confirmed then head onto the forums for instructions to join the official KK group.

"This is where you’ll connect with other members attending, voice any concerns you may have, arrange to meet for pre party drinks or merely engage in some cheeky banter on your morning commute."

In Ireland, for instance, the average age at a sex party is mid 30s and an even mix of genders.

Emma insists the sex parties are about empowering women.

Speaking previously, the practicing Christian continued: "We see a lot of single women coming on their own and we’ve seen a huge increase in the numbers of divorced women. Many women have spent their lives looking after their children and their husband’s and they want to do something for themselves and get their confidence back.

"Our members tend to be high flyers, successful people, the women tend to be independent and free thinking who know just what they want and come to us to get it.

"Groups of girls come in their 20’s who tend to be more fluid about their sexuality, they don’t seem to care about whether it is a man or woman they are flirting with or having sex with.

"They don’t seem to judge as much, whether it is a one night stand or whether they want to sleep with a woman. We are seeing more women on women with the younger generations.

"Some people just like to wander around and enjoy the party, some are complete exhibitionists and like the idea of being watched having sex while others just like to watch."

The next event is on October 19, with tickets for kittens costing £35 and for couples, £190.
description: Emma Sayle, from online community Killing Kittens and an old school pal of Kate Middleton, hosts "perfect naughty sex parties" where up to 150 open-minded people live out their wildest fantasies
